msbt.message: Hey, . Perfect timing. I've been thinking about moving out.I feel like I've been going through the motions lately. A big change could be just the challenge I need. Wherever I go, I'm going to start a new warrior-level training regimen.Ha ha! Oh, wow. I'm starting to get excited about moving!

Hey, . Got a sec? There's something that's been on my mind.I'm on the fence about whether I should leave this island.I've just been in a slump lately No matter what kind of weight training I do, I don't get the soreness I want.Maybe working out in a new place would change my mood and give me some of that muscle soreness back.
Listen up, !It pains me to say it, bud, but I've been thinking about leaving this island, .I haven't cleaned my place in forever. It's a total mess, and it's probably faster to move than tidy up.
Well, barbells! How can I leave if you want me to stay?That settles it. I'm not moving. I could never leave a buddy like you behind, .
Huh? You really want me to stick around?You're right. I've busted my tail here. I've drenched this hallowed ground with my sweat! Alright. You've opened my eyes. <10_4 />I'm staying right here, !
You're trying to stop me?<10_4 /> Pfft! If I'd known you felt this way, I wouldn't have brought it up.This changes everything. I'll be hanging out with you on this island for the long run, !
Oh! Well, thanks for the laps!I won't forget you. Take care of , .
Well, your response makes me feel confident about my decision.But don't let up on your training just 'cause I'm leaving . Do some push-ups!<10_4 /> Now.
Well, you're quite chipper about this, !It's decided, . I'm heading out to become a new !
